author: cnbc.com
title: McClatchy posts 4Q profit
text:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) _ McClatchy Co. (MNI) on Friday reported fourth-quarter net income of $60.4 million.
On a per-share basis, the Sacramento, California-based company said it had profit of $7.80. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 40 cents per share.
The media company and owner of The Kansas City Star posted revenue of $244.7 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $333.1 million, or $43.65 per share. Revenue was reported as $903.6 million.
McClatchy shares have fallen slightly more than 7 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has declined 28 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on MNI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/MNI
